about_the_game:
Welcome to Awaken Infinity! We invite you to embark on an unforgettable journey with our unique top-down RPG game, enriched with captivating elements of a visual novel. Here at Launch Solutions, we are passionate about crafting immersive gaming experiences that resonate with players. Awaken Infinity is the culmination of our dedication and creativity, and we are thrilled to share it with you.

About the Game

Awaken Infinity is more than just a game; it's a story-driven adventure that combines the best of RPG mechanics and visual novel narratives. Set in an enigmatic world, player will:
• Awaken with No Memory: Start your journey as you wake up in a futuristic room with no memory of who you are or how you got there. Unravel the mystery of your past and the strange world around you.
• Engage in Deep Storytelling: Dive into a rich narrative where your choices matter. Meet a cast of memorable characters, each with their own stories and secrets.
• Experience Visual Novel Elements: Enjoy beautifully illustrated scenes and dialogues that bring the story to life. The blend of visual novel storytelling with RPG gameplay creates a unique and immersive experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or comparable
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
